long description: Unlimited Local/STD calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable -- 1 GB 3G/2G Data + 1 GB/Day 3G/2G for 4G Handsets, Customers newly upgrading to 4G Handset will be eligible to get additional data only after 48 hours of handset upgrade. Additional data can be used on 4G handset only -- Get 5% Additional Talktime of MRP on recharges done exclusively on My Idea App and Idea Website -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.

Unlimited Local/STD + Roaming Calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 250 mins in a day or 1000 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, 30p/min Local+STD Calls Rates will be applicable within Validity Period -- 1 GB Data (4G handset users will get additional 1 GB/Day 3G data, Customers newly upgrading to 4G Handset will be eligible to get additional data only after 48 hours of handset upgrade. Additional data can be used on 4G handset only) -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity

Unlimited Local/STD + Roaming Calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 250 mins in a day or 1000 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, 30p/min Local+STD Calls Rates will be applicable within Validity Period -- 6 GB Data (4G handset users will get additional 1.5 GB/Day 3G data, Customers newly upgrading to 4G Handset will be eligible to get additional data only after 48 hours of handset upgrade. Additional data can be used on 4G handset only) -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity

Unlimited Local/STD Calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week.
